summary: This is an email chain from June 1, 2023, between two individuals discussing scheduling a meeting. The meeting is to discuss a new potential witness related to an old 'PC investigation' (likely referring to a previous investigation) involving Leon Black.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Mentioned as the related party to an old 'PC investigation' for which a new potential witness has emerged.

events.title: Scheduled meeting about new witness
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for around 2:30 PM to discuss a new potential witness in an old investigation related to Leon Black.

keyFacts: The email is dated June 1, 2023, discussing a meeting for June 2, 2023.
The purpose of the meeting is to discuss a new potential witness in an old investigation related to Leon Black.
The investigation is referred to as an 'old PC investigation'.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative activity related to Leon Black as of mid-2023.
